properties.name: @insert
properties.description: @insert is used to dynamically create a data type definition out of clippings. This allows reusage of definitions in different views and/or property dependent data type definitions.
properties.parameters: [["Clipping","Value","","Name of clipping to be inserted.  \r\nParameter is interpretated as clipping if no or 2 lists (workspaces,languages) are provided."],["Property","Value","","Name of property to be checked against.\r\nParameter is interpretated as property if 1 (options) or 3 lists (options, workspaces, languages) are provided"],["Workspaces","List","","The @insert annotation is limited to the listed workspaces."],["Languages","List","","The @insert annotation is limited to the listes langauges."]]
